member.name: M:art_gallery.Controllers.ArtifactController.GetArtifact(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a specific artifact by its ID.
member.param: The ID of the artifact to retrieve

member.name: M:art_gallery.Controllers.ArtifactController.AddArtifact(art_gallery.Models.Artifact)
member.param: The artifact to add
member.remarks:
Sample request:
POST /api/artifacts { "id": 1, "name": "Mona Lisa", "image": "https://example.com/monalisa.jpg", "artist": "Leonardo da Vinci", "description": "A portrait painting by Leonardo da Vinci" }

member.name: M:art_gallery.Controllers.ArtifactController.UpdateArtifact(System.Int32,art_gallery.Models.Artifact)
member.param: The ID of the artifact to update
Updated information for the artifact
member.remarks:
Sample request:
PUT /api/artifacts/1 { "id": 1, "name": "Updated Mona Lisa", "image": "https://example.com/updated-monalisa.jpg", "artist": "Leonardo da Vinci", "description": "An updated description of Mona Lisa" }

member.name: M:art_gallery.Controllers.ArtifactController.DeleteArtifact(System.Int32)
member.param: The ID of the artifact to delete

member.name: M:art_gallery.Controllers.ArtStyleController.GetArtStyle(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a specific art style by its ID.
member.param: The ID of the art style to retrieve

member.name: M:art_gallery.Controllers.ArtStyleController.AddArtStyle(art_gallery.Models.ArtStyle)
member.param: The art style to add
member.remarks:
Sample request:
POST /api/artstyles { "name": "Impressionism", "description": "Art movement characterized by small, thin, yet visible brush strokes, open composition, emphasis on accurate depiction of light in its changing qualities, ordinary subject matter, inclusion of movement as a crucial element of human perception and experience, and unusual visual angles.", "image": "https://example.com/impressionism.jpg", "creator": "Claude Monet" }

member.name: M:art_gallery.Controllers.ArtStyleController.UpdateArtStyle(System.Int32,art_gallery.Models.ArtStyle)
member.param: The ID of the art style to update
Updated information for the art style
member.remarks:
Sample request:
PUT /api/artstyles/1 { "id": 1, "name": "Updated Impressionism", "description": "An updated description of Impressionism", "image": "https://example.com/updated-impressionism.jpg", "creator": "Claude Monet" }

member.name: M:art_gallery.Controllers.ArtStyleController.DeleteArtStyle(System.Int32)
member.param: The ID of the art style to delete

member.name: M:art_gallery.Controllers.ExhibitionController.GetExhibition(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a specific exhibition by its ID.
member.param: The ID of the exhibition to retrieve

member.name: M:art_gallery.Controllers.ExhibitionController.AddExhibition(art_gallery.Models.Exhibition)
member.param: The exhibition to add
member.remarks:
Sample request:
POST /api/exhibitions { "name": "Impressionist Masterpieces", "description": "A collection of Impressionist artworks from various artists.", "place": "Art Gallery", "date": "2024-05-01T00:00:00" }

member.name: M:art_gallery.Controllers.ExhibitionController.UpdateExhibition(System.Int32,art_gallery.Models.Exhibition)
member.param: The ID of the exhibition to update
Updated information for the exhibition
member.remarks:
Sample request:
PUT /api/exhibitions/1 { "id": 1, "name": "Updated Impressionist Masterpieces", "description": "An updated description of the Impressionist Masterpieces exhibition.", "place": "Art Gallery", "date": "2024-05-01T00:00:00" }

member.name: M:art_gallery.Controllers.ExhibitionController.DeleteExhibition(System.Int32)
member.param: The ID of the exhibition to delete

member.name: M:art_gallery.Controllers.UserController.GetUserById(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a specific user by its ID.
member.param: The ID of the user to retrieve

member.name: M:art_gallery.Controllers.UserController.InsertUser(art_gallery.Models.User)

member.name: M:art_gallery.Controllers.UserController.UpdateCredentials(System.Int32,art_gallery.Models.Login)

Updated login credentials
